name: Aragorn AI
headline: Platform to automate employee data from everywhere to anywhere
description: Aragorn enables people ops and IT teams to continuously maintain employee data across diverse systems in a reliable, scalable, and cost-effective manner, all on a single platform - whether through API, EDI, Webhook, or file feeds.

founders.name: Ed Adjei, Founder
founders.description: Ed is the co-founder and CEO of Aragorn. Built over 700 HR data integrations at his previous company and has had one successfully exist. Dad of 2, and software engineer who is building the future of HRIS data integration

founders.name: Gladys Adjei, Founder
founders.description: Hi üëã I am the CPO of Aragorn. I worked as an engineer at Raytheon where I designed and developed various data security systems for the intelligence community

Power AI and Analytics with our data integrations
# **Automate employee data from everywhere to anywhere**
Aragorn makes it possible for your People Ops and IT teams to streamline employee data integration from any source point to any vendor or application system‚Äî whether through API, EDI, Webhook, or file feeds.
[Get a free trial](https://www.aragorn.ai/</free-trial>)
![Ingest HR data from anywhere and then integrate it using Aragorn's cloud marketplace of vendors](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61abc20c1b8ffb97186649df/6522211062ed2263efba32b3_Hero.png)
##### Trusted to organize data for leading brands
![Mission North
](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61abc20c1b8ffb97186649df/64a9b3e31ccddd56ccfbca7d_client_mission-north.png)![Plug and Play Tech Center](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61abc20c1b8ffb97186649df/64a9b3c51ccddd56ccfbb506_client_plugandplay.png)![emtrain](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61abc20c1b8ffb97186649df/64a9b3b61ccddd56ccfbab39_client_emtrain.png)![Plaid](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61abc20c1b8ffb97186649df/64a9b3c5f4bb3aa034846d6a_client_plaid.png)![Keurig Dr Pepper](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61abc20c1b8ffb97186649df/64a9b3b8a0520f0d7f7cff9b_client_KDP_LOGO_Full_Color%202.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61abc20c1b8ffb97186649df/6571e56352f8c6a663831797_comcast-logo.svg)
[](https://www.aragorn.ai/</articles/build-or-buy-the-aragorn-advantage>)
December 7, 2023
‚ùä

##### [Build or Buy: The Aragorn Advantage](https://www.aragorn.ai/</articles/build-or-buy-the-aragorn-advantage>)
Aragorn isn‚Äôt just any platform; it‚Äôs a no-code promise of efficiency, security, and unparalleled excellence that allows you to transform your HR operations, one integration at a time
[Read article](https://www.aragorn.ai/</articles/build-or-buy-the-aragorn-advantage>)
[](https://www.aragorn.ai/</articles/build-or-buy-the-cost-and-limitations-of-consulting-firms>)
December 5, 2023
‚ùä

##### [Build or Buy: The cost and limitations of consulting firms](https://www.aragorn.ai/</articles/build-or-buy-the-cost-and-limitations-of-consulting-firms>)
The tempting proposition of consulting firms: Is it truly the best route for your organizational needs when it comes to HR data integrations
[Read article](https://www.aragorn.ai/</articles/build-or-buy-the-cost-and-limitations-of-consulting-firms>)
[](https://www.aragorn.ai/</articles/build-or-buy-the-hr-it-integration-dilemma>)
October 12, 2023
‚ùä
Operations
##### [Build or Buy: The HR & IT Integration Dilemma](https://www.aragorn.ai/</articles/build-or-buy-the-hr-it-integration-dilemma>)
Tackling the HR tech maze: Should you build or buy HR integrations? Dive in for clarity on navigating the $34 billion market
[Read article](https://www.aragorn.ai/</articles/build-or-buy-the-hr-it-integration-dilemma>)
1
#### Connect from multiple sources
Harness the power of a unified data hub to seamlessly merge any employee data like demographics, payroll, deductions, and more with comprehensive data control and enrichment.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61abc20c1b8ffb97186649df/651b23f2bd6b4efe80c23e3f_Step2Graphic.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61abc20c1b8ffb97186649df/651c8640dcf442d929e52f86_StepImageLeft.png)
2
#### Create an integration
Our cloud marketplace is your one-stop solution for connecting employee data between systems like Workday, UKG, and your ATS, benefits providers, retirement services, employee engagement tools, compliance systems, and IT applications.
Benefit from AI-driven insights, predictive data mappings, and error handling that secures and puts your integrations on autopilot.
3
#### Deploy in an instant
With just one click, you can deploy your integration effortlessly. Our user-friendly dashboard provides real-time insights into your integration's status and health whenever you need it.
Worried about data security and compliance? You can easily track where your employee data is going, ensuring data compliance and creating a clear audit trail. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61abc20c1b8ffb97186649df/6511ffa18eacf9a62af0bc62_Step3Graphic.png)
# Where companies optimize their HR/IT integration process
##### Mission North
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61abc20c1b8ffb97186649df/6514786d17b12cddc52f9030_logo_missionnorth.png)
Aragorn streamlined their integrations to UHC, Google, Azure AD, Slack, Zoom, Traliant, Brivo, Uber, and eliminated their 3rd-party consulting costs for one-off integrations.
People Ops and Systems Admin team
$60K and 700+ hrs in ROI annually
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61abc20c1b8ffb97186649df/651232c362de0dee47ed8dd0_ribbon-arrow-up.svg)
[Get case study](https://www.aragorn.ai/</book-a-demo>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61abc20c1b8ffb97186649df/6512362870ad7f9398ed318c_casetudyspotlight.svg)
##### Plaid
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61abc20c1b8ffb97186649df/6514786d2b1af928f6ef0fdc_logo_plaid.png)
Aragorn streamlined their integrations to Anthem, Guardian, Qualtrics, OneMedical, Carrot Fertility, and eliminated 3rd-party consulting costs.
People Ops and BizTech team
$200K and 1,800+ hrs in ROI annually
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61abc20c1b8ffb97186649df/651232c362de0dee47ed8dd0_ribbon-arrow-up.svg)
[Get case study](https://www.aragorn.ai/</book-a-demo>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61abc20c1b8ffb97186649df/6512362870ad7f9398ed318c_casetudyspotlight.svg)
RESULTS USING ARAGORN
Sync unlimited data fields from your data sources
There are no limits to the number of employee data fields synced to vendors and applications. Bring in all your custom fields and extend your source data with calculated fields.
Build complex integrations in less than 3 weeks
With our pre-built connectors, you'll know your vendor's data needs right away. Connect your data, and it's automatically matched to the vendor's requirements. This makes setup, testing, and running your integration a breeze.
Get real time data syncs across all your integrations
When an employee's information changes, it's instantly reflected in your vendors and applications. This ensures all your systems are in sync at all times and prevents any conflicting or outdated data downstream.
# What our trusted partners say!
‚Äú
This has taken a lot of work off my plate. I don't have to closely monitor integrations or manually perform employee provisioning for system access or removal. This has helped me focus on more pressing matters.
Claudia S.
Plug and Play Tech Center
‚Äú
We have created a standardized integration for our clients HR data into our product and it's going well so far.
Bill T.
Emtrain
‚Äú
It's impressive how your engineering team ships new features and solutions that aligns with what we are looking for. Very nice to have one dashboard that shows all integrations and a field to toggle and see all vendors receiving any employee data.
Jeff K.
Keurig Dr. Pepper
# Employee data cleaned, integrated, done.
Start creating an integrated ecosystem for your organization
[Book a demo](https://www.aragorn.ai/</book-a-demo>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61abc20c1b8ffb97186649df/651474c1e6568c018772bf4f_Frame%20237734.png)

For organizations automating one integration at a time

Everything in Launch tier
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61abc20c1b8ffb97186649df/654d638c7ff2a60bad1ba922_check.svg)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61abc20c1b8ffb97186649df/654d638c7ff2a60bad1ba922_check.svg)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61abc20c1b8ffb97186649df/654d638c7ff2a60bad1ba922_check.svg)
Custom and calculated fields support
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61abc20c1b8ffb97186649df/654d638c7ff2a60bad1ba922_check.svg)
Integrations with any app or vendor
[Contact Aragorn Team](https://www.aragorn.ai/</book-a-demo>)
Most popular

generated_description:
**Aragorn AI: Revolutionizing Employee Data Management**

Founded in 2022 and backed by Y Combinator (Batch S22), Aragorn AI is a San Francisco-based startup that aims to simplify how organizations handle employee data. With a team of just four, they're tackling a big problem: the fragmented and often chaotic world of HR data integration.

**Mission and Offering**

Aragorn's mission is straightforward: to create a platform that allows for seamless automation of employee data from any source to any vendor, without the headaches that usually come with it. They provide a no-code integration solution that helps HR and IT teams manage employee information efficiently and cost-effectively. Their platform supports various integration methods‚ÄîAPIs, EDI, Webhooks, and file feeds‚Äîmaking data handling more scalable and reliable.

**What Makes Aragorn Stand Out?**

Aragorn provides a unified data hub that simplifies the merging of critical employee data‚Äîthink demographics, payroll, and compliance‚Äîwhile ensuring robust data security and compliance. Their approach eliminates the need for excessive consulting fees and complex manual processes.

Through their cloud marketplace, organizations can connect with multiple systems like Workday, UKG, and various ATS and compliance tools, thereby automating data tasks that were previously time-consuming and error-prone.

**Real-World Impact**

Their platform isn't just theoretical; it's already being trusted by notable companies like Plaid and Keurig Dr Pepper for streamlining their HR integrations, boasting impressive ROI. For instance, Plaid reported savings of over $200K and 1,800 hours annually by leveraging Aragorn‚Äôs integrations.

**Current Initiatives and Resources**

Aragorn is actively engaging with potential customers through resources like a free AI guidebook tailored for HR leaders, offering demonstrations of how their product operates, and even providing a free trial to entice organizations to try before they buy.

**The Future of Aragorn AI**

With a clear mission to transform HR operations through smart integrations, Aragorn AI is positioned well within the booming HR tech landscape. Their focus on building a unified, efficient data management solution could very well become the gold standard in how companies interact with their employee data. 

For those intrigued by the potential of streamlined HR data processes, exploring Aragorn‚Äôs offerings could be the first step towards a more harmonious workplace data environment. 

Find out more on their [website](https://www.aragorn.ai).
